dict.string:
Removes folder icons/labels & disables selection of the blank space left in its place.
- This patch can be useful "IF" you don't use folders and want a rudimentary alternative to some other tweaks like Anchor/GridLock, or tweaks that hide apps (but are still accessible from SpotLight) or just to make blank icon spaces etc.
Directions:
- (for Blank Icons): Make any safari bookmark/web clip & put it into a folder. Enable the patch/respring. Position surrounding icons to achieve your desired result. - (to Hide Apps from the HS): Put apps in a folder & position it as the last icon on your HS. Enable the patch/respring.
You must disable the patch whenever you'd like to add additional apps/web clips to a folder.
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 9.3.3. (8-7-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
Folder - Disable Icons/Labels (Hide Apps, Blank Icons & Anchor/GridLock Alternative) ₈₋₇₋₁
